attributes.action: Free School Meals for all schoolchildren to encourage healthy eating
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Too many schools are promoting unhealthy eating by selling burgers, twizzlers, etc. I would propose that all schoolchildren are given the right to a free school meal so long as a healthy (balanced) menu is incorporated as part of the startegy. The government should also discourage fast food vans, etc within an agreed radius of the school.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
